message.content:
cs.GT, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.EC, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with auction theory and optimization, which are topics commonly found in the Game Theory (cs.GT) and Data Structures (cs.DS) sub-categories. The use of linear programming to solve the optimization problem suggests a connection to Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and the study of economic mechanisms falls under the scope of Electronic Commerce (cs.EC). Finally, the mention of broadcasting signals and generating revenue hints at Information Theory (cs.IT) as a possible sub-category.
